item.title: By: Alan Brill

item.description: Well, are you posting them?? Feel free to post them here if you want.
item.content:encoded: Well, are you posting them?? Feel free to post them here if you want.

item.title: By: ADDeRabbi
item.dc:creator: ADDeRabbi
item.description: I'm interested in the same thing but from a different time. Hebrewbooks.org has a wealth of published sermons from pre-WWII American (and Canadian) rabbis. I've found references to the Stock Market Crash, the Hebron Massacre, and the Scopes Monkey Tiral.
item.content:encoded: I’m interested in the same thing but from a different time. Hebrewbooks.org has a wealth of published sermons from pre-WWII American (and Canadian) rabbis. I’ve found references to the Stock Market Crash, the Hebron Massacre, and the Scopes Monkey Tiral.
